segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right there, one foot in the puddle, but she doesn't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, the boy's on that wobbly stool reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, but she could get hurt too if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's ruining the cabinets already, streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so calm, totally unaware of the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me nervous; accidents are waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the mom paying attention to any of this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell and warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
